title: Version 1.2.4 Release Notes
text: Restored kegg.RData kegg.pathways.RData (November 2021) ensure retro‑compatibility benchmarked examples. Added new loadPathways() function retrieve latest pathway lists union (interactome) igraph objects, using wrapper graphite package Bioconductor project. Added tutorial vignette “Get Started”, Github . Various fixed bugs discovered release 1.2.3.

title: Version 1.2.3 Release Notes
text: CRAN release: 2025-01-29 Update kegg.RData kegg.pathways.RData (February 2025). Various fixed bugs discovered release 1.2.2.

title: Version 1.2.2 Release Notes
text: CRAN release: 2024-07-22 Delete predictSink() function. general function SEM-based --sample prediction now included SEMdeep package, uses Deep Neural Network (DNN) Machine Learning(ML) algorithms, released CRAN: 10.32614/CRAN.package.SEMdeep Various fixed bugs discovered release 1.2.1.

title: Version 1.2.1 Release Notes
text: CRAN release: 2024-02-06 Added new predictSink() function SEM-based --sample prediction (observed) response y-variables (sink nodes) given values (observed) x-variables (source mediator) nodes fitted graph structure. Added new transformData() function implementing various data trasformation methods perform optimal scaling ordinal nominal data, help relax assumption normality (gaussianity) continuous data. Update kegg.RData kegg.pathways.RData (February 2024). Various fixed bugs discovered release 1.2.0.

title: Version 1.2.0 Release Notes
text: CRAN release: 2023-05-04 Version 1.2.0 major release several new features, including: SEMrun() function. algo =“cggm” based high-dimensional GGGM now implemented de-sparsified (de-biased) nodewise LASSO procedure applied Gaussian DAG model. overall indices “deviance/df” “srmr” now computed using observed correlation matrix also p > n regime, estimated parameters computed using “regularized” (lambda corrected) correlation matrix. SEMbap() function. New deconfounding methods adjust data matrix removing latent sources confounding encoded implemented. selected methods either based : () Bow-free Acyclic Paths (BAP) search (dalgo = “cggm” “glpc”), (ii) LVs proxies additional source nodes data matrix, Y (dalgo = “pc” “glpc”) (iii) spectral transformation Y (dalgo = “pc” “trim”). SEMdag() function. New two-step DAG estimation input (empty) graph, using step 1) graph topological order bottom-search order, step 2) parent recovery LASSO-based algorithm implemented. estimate linear order obtained priori graph topological vertex (LO = “”) level (LO = “TL”) ordering, data-driven vertex level Bottom-(LO = “BU”) based “glasso” residual variance ordering. Top-(LO = “TD”) removed, BU efficient implement topological search order. Shipley.test() function. Added new argument cmax = Inf (default). parameter can used perform tests number conditioning variables exceed given value. Output data.frame “dsep” format localCI.test() function. Various fixed bugs discovered release 1.1.3.

title: Version 1.1.3 Release Notes
text: CRAN release: 2022-10-12 Added SEMrun() function argumet SE = c(“standard” “none”), algo = “lavaan”. Added SEMrun() function bootstrap resampling SE (95% CI), new argoment n_rep = 1000 (default) set bootstrap samples permutation flip, algo = “ricf”. Added SEMrun() function de-sparsified SE (95% CI) omega parameters (elements precision matrix), algo = “cggm”. Added new parameterEstimates() function parameter estimates output fitted SEM RICF CGGM algorithms similar lavaan. Updating summary.RICF() summary.GGM() functions parameterEstimates(). Various fixed bugs discovered release 1.1.2.

title: Version 1.1.2 Release Notes
text: CRAN release: 2022-07-05 Added new SEMtree() function tree-based structure learning methods. Four methods graph (type= “ST” “MST”) data-driven (type = “CAT” “CPDAG”) algorithms implemented. Deprecated activeModule() corr2graph() functions favor new SEMtree() function. Added new dagitty2graph() function conversion dagitty graph object igraph object. Added new localCI.test() function local conditional indipendence (CI) test missing edges acyclic graph. function wrapper localTests() function package dagitty. Added new arguments SEMace() function: type = c(“parents”, “minimal”, “optimal”) choose conditioning set Z Y X; effect = c(“”, “source2sink”, “direct”,) choose type X Y effect. Added new argument SEMdci() function: type = “ace” SEMace() function fixed type=“parents”, effect=“direct”. Change mergeGraph() function. Now function combines groups graph nodes using hierarchical clustering prototypes derived protoclust package custom membership attribute (e.g., cluster membership derived clusterGraph() function). Delete argument seed = c(0.05, 0.5, 0.5) function weigthGraph(). Now group NULL also node weighting actived, node weights correspond sign P-value z-test = b/SE(b) glm(node ~ group). Various fixed bugs discovered release 1.1.0.

title: Version 1.1.0 Release Notes
text: CRAN release: 2022-03-24 Version 1.1.0 major release significant changes: Added new arguments SEMdag() function: LO = “” “TD” knowledge-based topological order () data-driven top-order (TD), penalty = TRUE FALSE, binary penalty factors can applied L1-coefficient. Deprecated extendGraph() favor new resizeGraph() function, re-sized graph, removing edges adding edges/nodes present absent given reference network. Change modelSerch(), interactive procedure , now three step procedure implemented search strategies new SEMdag() resizeGraph() functions. Change SEMgsa() deleting D,,E p-values performing activation inhibition pvalues. Added argument MCX2= TRUE FALSE Shipley.test() function, Monte Carlo P-value combined C test. Added new SEMdci() function differentially connected genes inference. Change properties(), now extracted components order component sizes. Change argument q = q-quantile q = 1-top/vcount(graph) activeModule() function, now induced graph “rwr” “hdi” algorithms defined top-n ranking nodes. Various fixed bugs.
